article:
In Belarus higher education establishments can be of the following types:
* academy, conservatory â specialized universities;
* classical university;
* institute;
* higher college.

They can be either state-owned or privately owned (marked by a (*) before the
institution name).

'In Belarus 2 leading establishments of higher education in national
education system:'
* Belarusian State University () â Minsk
* Academy of Public Administration under the aegis of the President of the
  Republic of Belarus () â Minsk
